newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: AUSTRIAN NATBANK ALLOTS 15.27 BLN ATS IN REPOS.
newsitem.headline: AUSTRIAN NATBANK ALLOTS 15.27 BLN ATS IN REPOS.

text.p: The Austrian National Bank allocated 15.27 billion schillings ($1.2 billion) in two-week securities repurchase agreements at a unchanged, fixed rate of three percent on Friday.
The bank said it filled 12 percent of the bids.
Last week, the bank allotted 8.65 billion schillings in repos, filling 7.5 percent of the bids, also at a fixed, three-percent rate. -- Vienna newsroom, +431 531 12257 ($ = 13.12 Austrian Schillings)
